```sql

DELETE FROM audit_log
WHERE policy_id = 'REMOTE‑WORK‑001';
```

**Important:** Deleting audit logs can violate compliance regulations and internal policy. Always ensure you have appropriate approvals and retain necessary records before performing any deletion.
